product_name: Overland Equipment Donner Shoulder Bag - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Find what you need with ease in the well-organized Overland Equipment Donner Shoulder Bag. External trifold organizer provides dedicated storage for keys, electronics, passport and sunglasses. Zippered main compartment holds a book, wallet and lunch. Integrated side pockets stow a water bottle and a compact umbrella; pockets collapse against bag when not in use. Convenient external slip pocket on back of bag keeps important documents within reach. Adjustable strap comfortably slings over a shoulder. Strong nylon construction delivers long-lasting use. Closeout.
short_description: Find what you need with ease in the well-organized Overland Equipment Donner Shoulder Bag.
